div.p: The function which a CARE PROFESSIONAL performs in an ACTIVITY.
There a number of groupings of roles and a list of roles within each grouping.

The function that the CARE PROFESSIONAL is performing in an ACTIVITY could therefore be classified in a number of different ways. It will be possible to record only ONE role from each group for the ACTIVITY.
Where a CARE PROFESSIONAL is a member of a team, the role which they perform in the ACTIVITY will also be recorded.
